name: Agema
flavor: "Proactive mobility is a luxury. Reactive mobility is a necessity." - from a doctrinal dispute

name: Arihant
flavor: Some Titans speak of a transcendent state found only in battlefield success.

name: Armada
flavor: Cabal tactics assume they're bigger and less breakable than their opponents. Go make them revise.

name: Astrolord Greaves
flavor: When the last war comes, we will be the victors.

name: Blindsight Greaves
flavor: "The courage to walk into the Darkness, but strength to return to the Light." —Parables of the Allspring

name: BRONTIOS
flavor: When you stomp your feet, the ground should shake. If it doesn't, try adjusting the rumble packs in the soles.

name: Commando
flavor: Commando fireteams rely on their Ghosts for field intelligence and demolition plans.

name: Commando Custom
flavor: Crucible terrain is defined by ammo drop points and the sites where Ghosts revive their Guardians.

name: Dead Light Greaves
flavor: "When all is shadow, know your journey has begun." —Arach Parnell

name: Desolate Greaves
flavor: Transformation is not always revelation.

name: Dunemarchers
flavor: "Whether on solid rock or shifting sand dune, the inexorable Sand Eaters never slow their pace."

name: DURGA-GNT
flavor: I am a DURGA-GNT SYME TACTICAL TREAD. Let me walk on the broken corpses of your foes.

name: Duskrender
flavor: As part of the Pilgrim Guard, Tarlowe guided many refugees to safety behind the City's walls.

name: Elector's Greaves
flavor: Our footfalls forge the path to a new age.

name: Exodus Greaves
flavor: It will be cold and harrowing and we will not all survive. But it must be done.

name: Fieldplate
flavor: The sheer mass of Titan armor can break stone.

name: Firebreak
flavor: This design rebels against the defensive dogma of many Titan orders.

name: Garuda
flavor: "You had a place among us once. I thought that you could again. I was wrong." —Lilavati-12

name: Gatewatch
flavor: When the enemy presses the City, the final order will always be: stand your ground.

name: Greaves of No Tomorrow
flavor: When the last war comes, we will be the victors.

name: Greaves of the Exile
flavor: "Many followed him when he left—if not with their feet, then with their hearts." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Greaves of the Pariah
flavor: "To know true color, you must first know Darkness." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Greaves of the Seven
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Gwalior
flavor: "Remember that you carry the City's hopes. Go swiftly, and choose a place to make your stand."

name: Harrowed War Numen's Boots
flavor: Speak, and the Darkness obeys. Command, and the song turns upon itself.

name: Heliopause Greaves
flavor: We'll walk if we have to.

name: Hesperos
flavor: Like the deep-sea divers of old, the Hesperonauts plunged into the fiery calderas of Venus.

name: Highlander
flavor: One legend speaks of a Titan whose methodical, scrupulous patrol never met a foe. Was she still a hero?

name: Holdfast
flavor: Life's too short for a bad pair of boots - even on the second go round.

name: Illyrian
flavor: Titan doctrine grapples with the balance between fixed strength and fluid, positional advantage.

name: Immanent War Greaves
flavor: Stride through chaos; leave ash in your wake.

name: Infinite Lines Greaves
flavor: "Every time I look, it's like—the Darkness just grows larger." —RECORD 345-CHASM-6736

name: Iron Breed Greaves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Companion Greaves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Greaves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Ithacan
flavor: We leave the City to ensure there will still be a City when we return."

name: Jovian Guard
flavor: Are you prepared to walk where no one has trod for centuries?

name: Justicar's Greaves
flavor: Our choice is simple: find our strength, or face extinction.

name: Kabr's Forceful Greaves
flavor: He was claimed by the Vault. His armor and myth are all that remain.

name: Kallipolis Greaves
flavor: A City is only as strong as its leader.

name: Kellslayer's Greaves
flavor: All that remains are broken bodies and the lingering hint of dissipated ether.

name: Knight
flavor: Based on the Fieldplate design, the Knight pattern employs spinmetal and relic iron, sparing no expense.

name: Lightmail
flavor: Fabricated by your Ghost with available mass, this basic armor is very thin on plating.

name: Mk. 44 Stand Asides
flavor: Pardon me. Coming through.

name: Molniya
flavor: "I will endure a thousand thousand deaths, if each one buys a piece of victory."

name: Molniya Custom
flavor: Relentless advance. All-terrain grip. Sporty trim.

name: Monitor
flavor: "If a Hunter accuses you of hopping, tell them you're using rapid bounding traversal." - Gravitas Doctrines

name: Murvaux
flavor: "Kei-Ying. Gave his last full measure at Twilight Gap." —The Last Stands of First Pillars

name: MYCENAE
flavor: Whomever owned these boots had weird-shaped feet.

name: Objekt 959 Greaves
flavor: How does it feel to land a six-meter jump in full armor? That depends who you're landing on.

name: Oblivion Greaves
flavor: It will be cold and harrowing and we will not all survive. But it must be done.

name: Order's Greaves
flavor: Our choice is simple: find our strength, or face extinction.

name: Pacorus
flavor: "What happens to Guardians when they die for the last time?"

name: Pandion
flavor: Crucible variant. Rheostatic casings move with you like a second skin.

name: Peregrine Greaves
flavor: Victory from on high.

name: Queen's Guard Greaves
flavor: Carry yourself lightly, and with pride.

name: Raku Crucible Type
flavor: Crucible custom. Conformal gas injectors control fatigue with coolant and salve.

name: Raku Fulcrum
flavor: Crucible custom. Replace flash-burn heat sinks after prolonged engagements.

name: Scoutmail
flavor: Layers of ceramic, alloy, field drivers, and paracausal Light work together to give Titan armor surprising mobility.

name: Spearhead
flavor: "Evade the Cabal counterattack? My friend, they're finally sending us something worth killing." —Wei Ning

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Taroudant
flavor: "Wherever you go, your footprints mark the City's outermost walls."

name: Toutatis
flavor: After intense combat, the ankle plates will sometimes arc into the dust.

name: Ursus Tactical
flavor: "Shaxx is always telling us to stick together. I've come to think Shaxx really loves to watch us eat grenades."

name: Vanir
flavor: Smooth, tightly sealed plate speaks to the work of a master craftsperson aided by a Ghost.

name: VISIGOTH
flavor: The preferred armor pattern of Jagi's Host.

name: War Numen's Boots
flavor: Speak, and the Darkness obeys. Command, and the song turns upon itself.

name: Watchers' Greaves
flavor: "Light burns. Light heals. Light blinds. Light reveals." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Willbreaker's Greaves
flavor: The ground shudders beneath your feet.

name: Winged Sun Greaves
flavor: "Feet alone cannot take us to where we're going." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Witness Greaves
flavor: "Losing Queen very bad. What we do now is for her." —Variks

name: Zhurong
flavor: "To those behind the Wall, love and service. To those outside it, fury and fire." —Pilgrim Guard maxim

name: Dunemarchers
flavor: Whether on solid rock or shifting sand dune, the inexorable Sand Eaters never slow their pace.

name: Stellar Impact Greaves
flavor: Welcome to Mark 2 STELLAR IMPACT. Let's work on your entrance.

name: Spliced Cosmoclast Greaves
flavor: Willa, some of history's greatest inventions began as unintended side effects. ~SIVA.MEM.CL015

name: Scarab's Vigil Greaves
flavor: "The challenge will come when you least expect it. You must be ready." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Iron Saga Greaves
flavor: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

name: Days of Iron Greaves
flavor: "When the Iron Temple's fires were lit again, who came to stand before its hearth?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Cosmoclast Greaves
flavor: Willa, some of history's greatest inventions began as unintended side effects. ~SIVA.MEM.CL015

name: Endling Greaves
flavor: We are endangered, but we can save ourselves.

name: Eon Tracer Greaves
flavor: "I feel like every time I find the thread it slips through my fingers." —RECORD-448-CHASM-6565

name: High Command Greaves
flavor: Rise above the noise. Take the throne.

name: Mangonel Type 2
flavor: "An unjust commander is not worthy of loyalty." —Ouros

name: Raku Gwener Type 1
flavor: Crucible variant. Conformal gas injectors prevent overheating.

name: Greaves of Triumph
flavor: They tell your story everywhere you go: how you went to the end of the world and came home.
